content: this sweet little pullover sweater is knitted in one piece with just 2 short side seams and sleeve seams to join perfect for dolls and teddies add a sweet little bow for extra cuteness a lovely unisex design requirements dk yarn 4mm needles sizes extra-small preemie small preemie medium preemie large preemie bigger sizes up to 12 months are also available and very popular **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
